weather.question: I fall from the sky, and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from the clouds.
☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌧️ Pitter-patter!

weather.question: I am big and yellow and hot. I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I help the flowers grow.
😎 You might need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌞 I come out during the day.

weather.question: I'm white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like cotton.
🌬️ The wind helps me move.
☁️ Sometimes I bring rain.

weather.question: I can blow really hard and move the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make leaves fall.
🪁 You can fly a kite when I'm blowing.
💨 I'm all around you, but you can't see me.

weather.question: Sometimes after it rains, you can see me with many colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
💧☀️ I need both rain and sun to appear.
✨ I'm shaped like an arch.

weather.question: I am cold and white. I fall from the sky in the winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make snowballs with me.
⛄ I cover the ground and make it slippery.
🌨️ I melt when it gets warm.

weather.question: Sometimes the sun hides behind me, and it gets dark for a little while. What am I?

hints.text: 🌥️ I can be gray or white.
🌑 I cause shadows.
🌫️ I am thicker than a cloud.

weather.question: I am very hot and powerful, sometimes starting fires in the forest. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I come from the sky during storms.
⚡ I am a flash of light.
🌩️ I am often followed by thunder.

weather.question: I am a loud noise that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 Boom!
⛈️ I make you jump!
👂 You hear me during a storm.

weather.question: Sometimes I'm rain, sometimes I'm snow. I'm cold and wet. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I'm colder than rain but warmer than snow.
🧤 You need gloves when I fall.
🧊 I'm made of tiny ice pellets.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 Bunnies love to munch on me!
🌱 I grow in a garden.
💚 I am the color of grass.

plant.question: I am round and sweet. I grow on a tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate me!
🌳 I hang from branches.
🔴 I can be red, green, or yellow.

plant.question: I am tall and have leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 I am a home for many animals.
🪵 I have a big, brown trunk.
🍃 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell nice. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I attract bees and butterflies.
💐 You can give me as a gift.
🌷 I grow in a garden and come in many colors.

plant.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Rabbits love to munch on me!
🚜 I grow under the ground.
🧡 I am the color of pumpkins.

plant.question: I am small and green and grow in clusters. I taste yummy in juice. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇I can be green or purple.
🪴I grow on a vine.
🥤People make juice with me.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels hide me for the winter.
🌰 You have to crack me open to eat me.
🌳 I fall from trees in the autumn.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that is often green and looks like a tiny tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I look like a small tree.
👩‍🍳 Moms sometimes boil me.
🥗 I am good in a salad.

plant.question: I am yellow on the outside and white inside and grow underground. We can make yummy fries from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can make fries from me.
🚜 I grow underground.
🥔 I am brown outside and white inside.

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. I am often pickled. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 You can make a pickle out of me.
🌿 I grow on a vine.
🟢 I am green and crunchy.
